mapper.select: SELECT products.id, products.p_number, products.product, products.category, products.price, products.registration_date, products.deleted_date, stocks.stock_id, stocks.product_id, stocks.inventory, stocks.update_date FROM products INNER JOIN stocks ON products.id = stocks.product_id WHERE products.id = #{id}
SELECT id, p_number, product, category, price, registration_date, deleted_date FROM products WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT into products (p_number, product, category, price) values (#{p_number},#{product},#{category},#{price})
mapper.update: UPDATE products set p_number = #{p_number}, product = #{product}, category = #{category}, price = #{price} where id = #{id}
